body.name: Corsair iCUE Elite CPU Cooler LCD Display Upgrade Kit (Custom IPS LCD Screen, 24-Bit Color Depth, 16.7 Million Colors, 24 RGB LED Ring, CORSAIR iCUE Software Compatible) Black
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs 8 mins
features: Your Own Personalized LCD Dashboard: Do more with your CORSAIR ELITE Series CPU cooler than you ever thought possible, giving it custom graphics to accent your system’s aesthetics and track its performance in real-time at a glance.

Brilliant IPS LCD Display: Showcase your favorite animated GIF, funniest meme, your team’s logo, or anything you like on a custom 2.1” IPS LCD screen with 480x480 resolution and ultra-bright 600cd/m² backlight.
Decide Your Display Theme: A diverse library of colorful themes let you view vital system information in bold graphic display styles that suit your system and setup.
Full 24-Bit Color Depth: 24-Bit true color depth provides over 16.7 million rich, eye-popping colors for vibrant readouts and animations.
Easy Installation on CORSAIR ELITE CAPELLIX: Compatible with any CORSAIR iCUE ELITE CAPELLIX Liquid CPU Cooler, utilising four mounting magnets for quick and easy installation.
body.description: The CORSAIR iCUE ELITE CPU Cooler LCD Display Upgrade Kit transforms your CORSAIR ELITE CAPELLIX CPU cooler into a personalized dashboard, vividly displaying animated GIFs, images, and system stats on a vibrant LCD screen. With a 480x480 resolution, 24-bit true color depth, and 16.7 million colors, the ultra-bright 2.1” screen shines with crisp visuals, surrounded by a ring of 24 RGB LEDs. Use powerful CORSAIR iCUE software to upload your own images and GIFs, switch between display options such as CPU temps and fan speeds, and unlock full lighting synchronization across your entire iCUE setup. Choose from a diverse library of unique graphical themes to create a digital dashboard on display.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy to install
reviews.reviewText: There is a particular sequence to install this: Before doing anything, make sure all software and firmware is updated in icue for existing items connected to icue. Shut down your system, unplug the power and unplug the current cables from the unit you're replacing, use the allen wrench that is included to remove the old unit from the pump. install screws in the pump, install lcd screen, plug wires in where they need to go. It should show up automatically in icue when you start your system back up. In my case, the screen worked but it was not seen in icue, re-installing the software did not fix this, I ended up using a powered usb corsair hub to plug in both of my commanders and the usb header coming from the lcd. This was then plugged to my motherboard and now icue sees the lcd screen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great looking display
reviews.reviewText: This is a great upgrade for capillix pump heads, looks really nice. Icue update process was pretty terrible, says to update to current software before installation, I did this, then spent 20 min combing through every single setting looking for the lcd setting and couldn’t find. After restarting the PC icue needed to update again and it showed up, this after I checked for updates after initial install. Product is amazing as Corsair usually is, but software isn’t that good either like icue usually is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Corsair did a great job with the Capellex upgrade. It was so easy to install, and looks amazing!One minor gripe, I with the screen was a bit brighter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is my FORTH AIO water cooler from Corsair. The first three were and still are working great. This one is worthless. I've replaced the hub, the screen and the usb cable and it still won't display. it worked for a week then crapped out. Tech Support was worthless. I ended up tossing it in the trash. That one has been working great for months now. Neat idea, but a complete waste of money. I would avoid this product and after talking with their tech support avoid this company altogether.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun gadget or purposeful device is up to the user
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Put together a new system over the holidays and wanted a way to display both CPU and GPU temperatures when gaming. Came across this Corsair water pump cap with an IPS display that fits my H150i Elite Capellix AIO and can be programmed via iCUE to display pretty much anything one could imagine - including gifs!It took under 30 minutes to swap out the old pump cap for the new one with the only tool needed being an allen wrench included with the kit. After updating iCUE and the firmware for the display it took about five minutes to add the display to my "mural" and program it for the two temperature readings. Then, for when the grandkids come by, I set up a gif of them celebrating the New Year :)Cheers!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Vale la pena colocarlo, si eres fan gamers y te gusta los detalles

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Do not take shortcuts disassemble everything
reviews.reviewText: Do not take shortcuts, and make sure to unscrew the back of the actual lcd screen if it does not fit on your cooler

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fast and Easy setup
reviews.reviewText: Lest than 30m to pull out the old non-display and put in the new with meaningful info.iCUE software is another issue as we all know.At the end of a long gamming session with the case sitting off to the side of desktop and at eye level, a quick glance lets me know if I need to let the system run for awhile to cool down or safely shut it down. Below 110 F = shutdown, over that threshold wait a bit.

reviews.reviewerName: alan jahir crespi gonzalezalan jahir crespi gonzalez
reviews.reviewTitle: no logro que lo detecte mi enfriamiento liquido

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Een geweldige oplossing om de Capellix modellen van Corsair te upgraden naar de ELITE LCD uitvoering. Het installeren is super simpel en snel. De prijs is alleen wel vrij hoog, maar ik vind het de prijs waard.
Qualité d’écran vraiment très bonne, lumineux et bien défini, modification à souhait….Montage très simple , bref kit upgrade plutôt bien réussi.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Easiest installation, Quick to set up, Lcd is clear, works as it should.Follow the installation guide you can't go wrong.One tip tho, if it don't show up in icue after install or is flashing red. DO NOT RESTART YOUR PC or it might not come back on.Instead exit icue , restart it, it will automatically download and update the driver and will change over to the new installation.Happy Gaming 😊
Quite easy to install Process took about thirty minuters.
